attributes.action: Give nurses and NHS staff a greater pay rise than 1%
attributes.additional_details: It's the right thing to do.
attributes.background: Put the money where your mouths are. It's no use praising the NHS during the Covid crisis and then let them down. You've shot your selves in the foot. Actions speak louder than words. Words are cheap. Why not raise income tax by 1 penny in the pound to pay for it.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
